text: Rammstein is a German Neue Deutsche Härte band created in Berlin in 1994. The band's musicians—lead vocalist Till Lindemann, lead guitarist Richard Kruspe, rhythm guitarist Paul Landers, bassist Oliver Riedel, drummer Christoph Schneider and keyboardist Christian "Flake" Lorenz—has stayed the same throughout history. They were first to start using the Neue Deutsche Härte style, with their debut album leading the press to start the term, and their style of music had a positive reaction from music critics. The band has been very successful, earning many No. 1 albums as well as gold and platinum certifications around the world. Rammstein
title: List of awards and nominations received by Rammstein
